name: Cyber Strider
description:
Embark on a perilous journey through randomized sectors overrun by rogue AI-controlled drones in the aftermath of a catastrophic event. As a skilled Mercenary, your mission is to:

  • Uncover the origins of this devastating chaos
  • Hone your abilities and become ever more powerful

Navigate treacherous landscapes, confront relentless adversaries, and forge your path to victory, growing stronger and more formidable with every daring attempt under the supervision of your commanding officer Ren.


  • Unlock a wide range of formidable weapons and unleash your full potential in combat.
  • Harness the protective capabilities of energy shields, boosters, and other utility attachments to enhance your survivability.
  • Repurpose hostile drones and turn them into valuable allies to aid you in your mission.
  • Mix And Match powerful augmentations to amplify your destructive capabilities and dominate your enemies.


Your choices hold immense significance as you venture through a vast universe. Every decision shapes your path, leading to consequences that can be both transformative and impactful. Navigate wisely, for your choices will determine your destiny.



As if one player was not bad enough, a friend can hop in and join the struggle.(persuasion skills are not included).
